name: Anthill Anthology
description:
Anthill Anthology is an RTS with puzzle elements, where you control a group of ants to lead them to the safety of their nest.

The game was created in 2 days for the Stay Safe! Jam. Every asset was created by me except music and sound effects, which were taken from the Stay Safe! Jam asset library they made available for everyone.

Make sure to play in full screen when launching the game from the WebGL version!
